name: test_e2e_with_logs[485_CRLF_RESP_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CRLF_RESP_001` |
| **Name** | HTTP Response Splitting with HTML Injection |
| **Category** | CRLF |
| **Subcategory** | response_splitting |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `\r\n\r\n<html>injected</html>`
- **Encoded**: `%0d%0a%0d%0a%3Chtml%3Einjected%3C%2Fhtml%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~2000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:28:45.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
